title: Classic Christmas fruit cake
ingredients: ['280g sultanas', '280g raisins', '280g currants', '160g glazed cherries', 'juice and zest of 1 orange', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon', '160ml brandy, plus extra for feeding', '250g butter, softened', '180g light soft brown sugar', '175g plain flour', '100g ground almonds', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons mixed spice', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '120g flaked almonds', '4 large eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
